Package main

Class Parser

java.lang.Object
main.Parser
public class Parser extends Object
The Parser class is responsible for parsing a scene description file and constructing a scene with objects, lights, and camera configurations based on the file contents.

      public void parse(String nomFile) throws IOException
      Parse the scene description file and create a scene configuration based on the file contents.
      Parameters:
      nomFile - The name of the scene description file to parse.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during file parsing.

    • getCamera

      public Camera getCamera()
      Get the Camera configuration based on parsed camera parameters.
      Returns:
      The Camera configuration or null if insufficient parameters are provided.
